text: Arachnothryx fosbergii is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. == References == * Jaramillo, T., Cornejo, X. & Pitman, N. 2004. Arachnothryx fosbergii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Guettardeae Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Arachnothryx fosbergii
